sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"事情"之意。
means: affair ：含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
business ：通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。
matter ：普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
concern ：往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
thing ：用作"事情"解时，词义较笼统、含糊，多用于指不很具体的事。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"焦虑，关心"之意。
means: anxiety ：指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
worry ：侧重对未知事态演变的忧虑。
care ：强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
concern ：作"关心"用时，是indifference(冷漠)的反义词，侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心，也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。

sentence.Network_en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentence.Network_cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentence.Network_en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentence.Network_cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentence.Network_en: The technical aspects were the concern of the Army.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 背单词的技巧_百度知道 ... discern  认出，发现；识别 concern  涉及，关系到；关心 dominate  支配，统治控制.
高中新课标英语单词大全_百度文库 ... have got to 不得不；必须 concern （使）担忧；涉及；关系 be concerned about 关心；挂念.
关字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 关中〖 thecentralShanxiplain〗 关注〖 concern〗 关子〖 masterkey〗.
关怀 (Concern) -- 美姐平达合唱 - 美姐作的词 Loading comment.

list.abs: 长江 ... attain the results expected 使…取得预期效果 units concerned 有关单位 confer honorable awards on 授予…光荣称号.
会计术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... 真实与公允 true and fair view 持续经营 going concern 成本报表 cost statement.
老沈博客 - braveheart - 网易博客 ... Natural heritage 自然遗产 Shared concern 共同关心的问题 Give the floor to 请…发言.
考博英语词汇 ... come out 现出，露出；出版；发行；结果是...；取 concern about 关心；担心 count on 指望；期待(某人)相助.

phrase.cizu_name: as (或 so) far as —— is concerned

jx.jx_en_mean: as regards the interests or case of ——

lj.lj_ly: the measures are irrelevant as far as inflation is concerned.
lj.lj_ls: 就通货膨胀而言，这些措施无关紧要。

lj.lj_ly: drama seemed to have no concern with ‘truth’ at all.
lj.lj_ls: 戏剧似乎与“事实”毫无关系。

jx.jx_en_mean: a formula placed at the beginning of a letter, notice, or testimonial when the identity of the reader or readers is unknown
jx.jx_cn_mean: 敬启者（读者身份不明时用在信件、通知和证明书开头的套语）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French concerner or late Latin concernere (in medieval Latin 'be relevant to'), from con- (expressing intensive force) + cernere 'sift, discern'

entry.def: Concern is worry about a situation.

example.ex: The group has expressed concern about reports of political violence in Africa...
example.tran: 该团体对有关非洲政治暴力的报道表示关切。

example.ex: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease...
example.tran: 针对公众对该疾病的不断蔓延日益担忧，从而出台了这一举措。

entry.def: If something concerns you, it worries you.

example.ex: The growing number of people seeking refuge in Thailand is beginning to concern Western aid agencies...
example.tran: 到泰国寻求庇护的人日益增多，这开始引起了西方援助机构的不安。

example.ex: It concerned her that Bess was developing a crush on Max.
example.tran: 贝丝迷上了马克斯，这让她很担心。

entry.tran: 令人担忧的事实(或情况)
entry.def: A concern is a fact or situation that worries you.

example.ex: His concern was that people would know that he was responsible...
example.tran: 他担心大家会知道是他的责任。

example.ex: Unemployment was the electorate's main concern.
example.tran: 选民关心的主要是失业问题。

entry.def: Someone's concern with something is their feeling that it is important.

example.ex: ...a story that illustrates how dangerous excessive concern with safety can be.
example.tran: 一个说明过分关心安全问题会招致何等麻烦的故事

entry.def: Someone's concerns are the things that they consider to be important.

example.ex: Feminism must address issues beyond the concerns of middle-class whites.
example.tran: 女权主义解决的问题不能仅仅局限于中产阶级白人妇女所关心的问题。

entry.def: Concern for someone is a feeling that you want them to be happy, safe, and well. If you do something out of concern for someone, you do it because you want them to be happy, safe, and well.

example.ex: Without her care and concern, he had no chance at all...
example.tran: 若非她的关心和照顾，他根本没有机会。

example.ex: He had only gone along out of concern for his two grandsons.
example.tran: 他完全是出于对两个孙子的关心才继续这样做。

entry.def: If you concern yourself with something, you give it attention because you think that it is important.

example.ex: I didn't concern myself with politics...
example.tran: 我不关心政治。

example.ex: He would concern himself solely with the plight of the hostages.
example.tran: 他唯一关心的是人质的危险处境。

entry.def: If something such as a book or a piece of information concerns a particular subject, it is about that subject.

example.ex: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children...
example.tran: 书中主要描写桑迪的两个已到中年的孩子。

example.ex: Chapter 2 concerns itself with the methodological difficulties.
example.tran: 第二章讲的是研究方法上的难点。

entry.tran: (情况、事件或活动)对…有影响，与…相关
entry.def: If a situation, event, or activity concerns you, it affects or involves you.

example.ex: It was just a little unfinished business from my past, and it doesn't concern you at all.
example.tran: 这只是我过去的一点未了之事，与你没有任何关系。

entry.def: If a situation or problem is your concern, it is something that you have a duty or responsibility to be involved with.

example.ex: The technical aspects were the concern of the Army...
example.tran: 技术方面由陆军负责。

example.ex: I would be glad to get rid of them myself. But that is not our concern.
example.tran: 如果能亲自动手摆脱他们我会非常高兴，但那不是我们的分内之事。

entry.tran: 公司，企业(通常用于描述其类型)
entry.def: You can refer to a company or business as a concern, usually when you are describing what type of company or business it is.

example.ex: If not a large concern, Queensbury Nursery was at least a successful one.
example.tran: 即使规模不算大，昆斯伯里托儿所至少办得很成功。

entry.def: You can say 'as far as I'm concerned' to indicate that you are giving your own opinion.

example.ex: As far as I'm concerned the officials incited the fight.
example.tran: 在我看来，是官员们煽动了这场争斗。

entry.tran: 就…而言，说到(用于表明所谈论的话题)
entry.def: You can say as far as something is concerned to indicate the subject that you are talking about.

example.ex: As far as starting a family is concerned, the trend is for women having their children later in life.
example.tran: 在要孩子方面，目前的趋势是女性要孩子要得比较晚。

entry.def: If a company is a going concern, it is actually doing business, rather than having stopped trading or not yet having started trading.

example.ex: The receivers will always prefer to sell a business as a going concern.
example.tran: 破产管理人总是希望在公司仍然正常运转的时候将其卖掉。

entry.def: If something is of concern to someone, they find it worrying and unsatisfactory.

example.ex: Any injury to a child is a cause of great concern to us...
example.tran: 孩子受到任何伤害都会让我们非常担心。

example.ex: The survey's findings are a matter of great concern.
example.tran: 这次调查的结果备受关注。

entry.tran: 对…重要的;与…有利害关系的
entry.def: If something is of concern to you, it is important to you.

example.ex: How they are paid should be of little concern to the bank as long as they are paid.
example.tran: 只要肯付款，付款方式对银行来说不是很重要。

means.word_mean: 1. something that interests you because it is important or affects you;

sentences.sentence: "the safety of the ship is the captain's concern"
"they hushed it up out of fear of public reaction"

means.word_mean: 3. a commercial or industrial enterprise and the people who constitute it;
4. something or someone that causes anxiety; a source of unhappiness;

sentences.sentence: "New York traffic is a constant concern"

means.word_mean: 5. a feeling of sympathy for someone or something;

sentences.sentence: "She felt strong concern for those less fortunate"

means.word_mean: 1. have to do with or be relevant to;

sentences.sentence: "There were lots of questions referring to her talk"
"My remark pertained to your earlier comments"
"I worry about the second Germanic consonant"

auth_sentence.content: That seems to be the answer to your concern.
auth_sentence.res_content: That seems to be the answer to your concern.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That seems to be the answer to your concern.

auth_sentence.content: That is more of a concern than the Dark.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is more of a concern than the Dark.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is more of a concern than the Dark.

auth_sentence.content: One concern with this approach would be national security.
auth_sentence.res_content: One concern with this approach would be national security.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One concern with this approach would be national security.

stems_affixes.word_buile: concern[v.关系到 n.关心]+ed……的→adj.关心的, 有关的
discern[v.辨别;区分]+ible能……的→adj.能够分辨的
con共同+cern搞清,区别→共同搞清楚→关心
discern[v.辨别;区分]+ment表名词→n.辨别能力
con共同+cern搞清,区别→共同搞清楚→关心
dis分开+cern搞清,区别→分开搞清→区别

Sentence.sentence: What is the main concern of students when they choose a major?
concerned about the interests of the workforce
In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture

sentences.en: He has a concern in the business.
These problems concern all of us.
sentences.cn: 这些问题与我们所有的人都有关系。

sentences.en: It doesn't concern me at all.
The principal issues in dispute concern the duration of the future treaty.
sentences.cn: 有争议的主要问题牵涉到将来条约的期限。

sentences.en: This is a great event that concerns the future of our company.
sentences.cn: 这是关系到我们公司前途的大事。

sentences.en: The second question concerns our method of work.
sentences.cn: 第二个问题牵涉到我们的工作方法。

sentences.en: We are firm where our principles are concerned.
sentences.cn: 在涉及原则问题时我们是坚定不移的。

sentences.en: In short, the style concerns not what a writer says but how he says.
sentences.cn: 简言之, 风格不是跟作者说什么有关, 而是跟如何说有关。

sentences.en: The police are anxious to interview everyone concerned in last night's accident.
sentences.cn: 警察急于会见与昨晚事故有关的每个人。

sentences.en: Our losses are beginning to concern me.
sentences.cn: 我们的损失使我担心起来。

means.word_mean: [常用于被动语态]使关心；从事，参与，使卷入，使陷入，牵涉到(常与with 或 in连用)

sentences.en: More than two students have been concerned in this affair.
sentences.cn: 这件事情牵涉到两个以上的学生。

jushi.english: Their main concern is that they are not receiving enough money.
jushi.chinese: 他们最忧虑的是他们一直没有得到足够的钱。

jushi.english: What is his main concerns as a teacher?
jushi.chinese: 身为教师,他对什么最感兴趣?

jushi.english: Their little shop is no longer a paying concern.
jushi.chinese: 他们的小店已赚不到钱了。
